languages.text: {n}Каркающий смех раздается у вас в голове.{/n} "Лишь ты слышишь мой глас, Дитя. Не говори со мной — лишь внимай". {n}Вы чувствуете как чуждое присутствие уходит обратно на задворки разума — выжидать.{/n}

{n}A cackle comes from inside your head.{/n} "Only you can hear my voice, Child. Do not talk to me. Just pay attention." {n}You feel the intruding presence recede to the periphery of your mind, to bide its time there.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Каркающий смех раздается у вас в голове.{/n} "Лишь ты слышишь мой глас, Дитя. Не говори со мной — лишь внимай". {n}Вы чувствуете как чуждое присутствие уходит обратно на задворки разума — выжидать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A cackle comes from inside your head.{/n} "Only you can hear my voice, Child. Do not talk to me. Just pay attention." {n}You feel the intruding presence recede back to the periphery of your mind, to bide its time there.{/n}

{n}A cackle comes from inside your head.{/n} "Only you can hear my voice, Child. Do not talk to me. Just pay attention." {n}You feel the intruding presence recede to the periphery of your mind, to bide its time there.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的脑海中传来了咯咯声。{/n}“只有你能听到我的声音，孩子。不用和我说话，只要留意就够了。”{n}你感觉到外界意识再次退到了你的思想边缘，静静地等待着时机。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cackle comes from inside your head.{/n} "Only you can hear my voice, Child. Do not talk to me. Just pay attention." {n}You feel the intruding presence recede to the periphery of your mind, to bide its time there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的脑海中传来了咯咯声。{/n}“只有你能听到我的声音，孩子。不用和我说话，只要留意就够了。”{n}你感觉到外界意识再次回到了你的思想边缘，静静地等待着时机。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Gackern ertönt aus dem Inneren deines Kopfs.{/n} "Nur Ihr könnt meine Stimme hören, Kind. Sprecht nicht mit mir. Hört einfach nur zu." {n}Du spürst, wie sich die fremde Präsenz an den Rand deines Verstands zurückzieht, um dort abzuwarten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cackle comes from inside your head.{/n} "Only you can hear my voice, Child. Do not talk to me. Just pay attention." {n}You feel the intruding presence recede to the periphery of your mind, to bide its time there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Gackern ertönt aus dem Inneren deines Kopfs.{/n} "Nur Ihr könnt meine Stimme hören, Kind. Sprecht nicht mit mir. Hört einfach nur zu." {n}Du spürst, wie sich die fremde Präsenz an den Rand deines Verstands zurückzieht, um dort abzuwarten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Oyes una risotada en tu cabeza.{/n} «Tú eres {mf|el único|la única} que puede oír mi voz. No me hables. Limítate a prestar atención». {n}Notas que la presencia invasora se retira a la periferia de tu mente para aguardar el momento propicio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cackle comes from inside your head.{/n} "Only you can hear my voice, Child. Do not talk to me. Just pay attention." {n}You feel the intruding presence recede to the periphery of your mind, to bide its time there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes una risotada en tu cabeza.{/n} «Tú eres {mf|el único|la única} que puede oír mi voz. No me hables. Limítate a prestar atención». {n}Notas que la presencia invasora se retira a la periferia de tu mente para aguardar el momento propicio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un rire résonne dans votre tête.{/n} « Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez entendre ma voix, Enfant de l'Aube. Ne me répondez pas, contentez-vous de m'écouter. » {n}Vous sentez la présence intruse se replier en périphérie de votre esprit, pour y attendre son heure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cackle comes from inside your head.{/n} "Only you can hear my voice, Child. Do not talk to me. Just pay attention." {n}You feel the intruding presence recede to the periphery of your mind, to bide its time there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rire résonne dans votre tête.{/n} « Vous {mf|seul|seule} pouvez entendre ma voix, enfant de l'Aube. Ne me répondez pas, contentez-vous de m'écouter. » {n}Vous sentez la présence intruse se replier en périphérie de votre esprit, pour y attendre son heure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}頭の中から甲高い笑い声が聞こえてくる。{/n}「私の声が聞こえるのは、あなただけよ。私に話しかけないで。ただ注意を払って」{n}あなたは、侵入者が精神の外縁まで後退し、そこで時を待つのを感じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cackle comes from inside your head.{/n} "Only you can hear my voice, Child. Do not talk to me. Just pay attention." {n}You feel the intruding presence recede to the periphery of your mind, to bide its time there.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}頭の中から甲高い笑い声が聞こえてくる。{/n}「私の声が聞こえるのは、あなただけよ。私に話しかけないで。ただ注意を払って」{n}あなたは、侵入者が精神の外縁まで後退し、そこで時を待つのを感じた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kafanın içinde bir kıkırtı yankılanıyor.{/n} "Benim sesimi yalnızca sen duyabilirsin Evlat. Benimle konuşma. Yalnızca odaklan." {n}Davetsizce zihnini işgal eden varlığın, doğru anı kollamak için aklının karanlık köşelerine çekildiğini hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cackle comes from inside your head.{/n} "Only you can hear my voice, Child. Do not talk to me. Just pay attention." {n}You feel the intruding presence recede to the periphery of your mind, to bide its time there.{/n}
